title: President to meet SLPP MPs today (20)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); President Gotabaya Rajapaksa is to meet with the MPs from the Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna today (20).
The meeting will be held following the Cabinet Meeting at 5 PM.
The fuel crisis and measures to address the crisis, as well as the next parliament week will be discussed at the meeting.
Police detain GotaGoGama protestors who obstructed gates to President’s Office
Sri Lanka record highest ODI chase against Australia to go 2-1 up
